main event: A high school girl and military personnel reported seeing a UFO near Greenville, Mississippi on August 27, 1953.
interesting points: The UFO was observed at an altitude of around 5,000 feet,It was circular in shape and emitted red and white flashing lights,Reports indicate the object had a tail about the size of a tennis ball,Multiple witnesses, including Air Force personnel, described the object as rotating and changing brightness,The sighting lasted from 22:15 to 22:38 hours.
witness description: includes a high school girl and several Air Force personnel
